commit_message: run_pipeline launches from your current directory
Add check to prevent repeated patients in patients.csv
Fix file formatting for mosdepth to work with multqic
Add individual rule log names, user now specifies log path in config.yaml

Update time resources

Multiply time limits for read group dependent rules by 3 to account for some samples only having 1 read group. Close #74
update gitignore. Add python script to profile runtimes

Merge pull request #72 from tjbencomo/v2.0

V2.0
Pipeline works after testing. Updated cluster.wes to use reasonable amount of resources
Remove my info from cluster exec
Clean up config files and common.smk
Update cluster execution info and create separate files for WES/WGS. Still need to put resources for WGS
Start implementation of new interval handling
implement spark tools and update to match warp pipeline
Finish updating environments to singularity. Clean up other scripts
Update FilterMutectCalls to require 1 read in each direction
Fix error that waited for all mutect2 intervals for ALL samples before trying to merge VCF for a single sample

Merge pull request #58 from tjbencomo/parallel-mutect2

Parallel mutect2
Implemented parallel mutect2 update and works with WES data
Remove --use-original-qualities, fix -ob-priors argument and add tmp directory support
Fix orientation bias argument for FilterMutectCalls
update config for tumor only mode

Merge pull request #56 from tjbencomo/tumor-only

Tumor only
Add WGS support for coverage calculations. Specify with seqtype column in units file
Add LearnOrientationBias step to variant calling workflow
Add tumor only mode for variant calling without matched normal sample. Add pileup summary call for normal sample if available. Upadte FilterMutectCalls to use Mutect2 stats file

Merge pull request #54 from tjbencomo/plot-depth

Plot depth
Fix alternate isoform issue for vcf2maf and add extra output files for mosdepth
Add option to override default Ensembl isoforms for vcf2maf selection

Close #47. Modify cluster.json to remove deprecated VEP rule. Remove thread requirement for calling.smk and pon.smk as Mutect2 didn't seem to be using the extra threads. Sort units index in common.smk to improve performance
Add info about which VEP cache version to install
Removed VEP rule because vcf2maf does VEP annotation for you. VEP rule was redundant
Add PON rules to cluster.json. Use MultiQC wrapper for preprocessing. Make combine_mafs output TSV following MAF format
Add more resources for annotation rules

Multiplexed samples

V1.0.1
Remove environment.yml. Instead we use several smaller environments depending on the rule. These are found in envs/

Add singularity and conda tags to each rule for enhanced reproducibility. Remove temp file status for Mutect2 outputs as these are needed by FilterMutectCalls
Add feature that makes filter_calls create index file for VCF
Add rule to create bwa index files if they don't already exist. Close #28
